I have a test case which demonstrates this, and can commit it, but it runs the

I'm reopening this as there is a fix we can do which wont break anything 
existing, and that is add a useSecurityManager attr which does what it says on 
java1.2+ when fork=false. As the default would be false no existing code would 
break, only new stuff you wanted to catch.
